commit message: - changed version number and added new key for new crash reports document

- added linkable stiftung
- refined reload on zoom in mapsforge
InfoActivity refactoring to ListView with custom adapter. Item type with 1 simpe text displayed
additional widget types for activity item, 2 lines text item
two clickble text in one list item
- removed unused thin in location manager

- reworked wheelchair state layout and strings to an explicit need
- slovakian translation for ws_* keys need to reflect that
- added functionality to not forget wheelchair state changes, as server needs several minutes to deliver updated info
- added app2sd, beware: needed to change build target to 2.2 to allow this. This is backwards compatible as long as there is no use of 2.2 java stuff
- added functionality to crash-logger for logging memoryclass and memory info
- reworked legal notice activity to better match credits activity
- reworked saving of pending wheel status update

- added new acra key for v0.7 release
- refined wheelchair state with style attribute
- crashfix for npe after clicking on edit wcstate, if poiid couldnt be loaded
- increased versionCode and versionName for 0.7 release
